sentence.Network_en: The deficit had grown with the connivance of the banks.
sentence.Network_cn: 在银行的放纵之下，赤字增加了。

sentence.Network_en: The goods were exported with official connivance.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些商品是在官方的默许下出口的。

sentence.Network_en: The crime was committed with the connivance of a police officer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项罪行是在警察的纵容下发生的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...connection n. 连接；（s）亲属；熟人，关系户；由共同利益结合在一起的人connivance n. 默许，共谋connive v. 纵容，默许，共谋
suggesting connivance ., 令人想起纵容的行为.
he tried to bribe the police into connivance .他企图收买警察放他一马。

list.abs: 打小算盘show petty shrewdness：打佯儿：connive at打肿脸充胖子：puff oneself up to one`s own cost.
they connived to kill him .他们共谋要杀害他.
The jailer connived at the escape from prison ., 狱吏纵容犯人的逃狱.
The mercenary hid his conniving smile at the sight of Vierna ' s obvious pleasure ., 面对着维尔娜显而易见的愉悦 , 佣兵隐藏了他阴险的笑容.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (also in the Latin sense 'winking'): from French connivence or Latin conniventia, from connivere 'shut the eyes (to') (see connive)

entry.def: Connivance is a willingness to allow or assist something to happen even though you know it is wrong.

example.ex: The deficit had grown with the connivance of the banks...
example.tran: 在银行的放纵之下，赤字增加了。

example.ex: The goods were exported with official connivance.
example.tran: 这些商品是在官方的默许下出口的。

auth_sentence.content: It did this dirty deed with connivance and blood.
auth_sentence.res_content: It did this dirty deed with connivance and blood.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It did this dirty deed with connivance and blood.

auth_sentence.content: Unlike drug use, slavery could be eradicated the brutal institution needed the connivance of the law to survive.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unlike drug use, slavery could be eradicated the brutal institution needed the connivance of the law to survive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unlike drug use, slavery could be eradicated the brutal institution needed the connivance of the law to survive.

auth_sentence.content: It's not difficult for them to make the children disappear ... with the connivance, possibly, of government officers.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's not difficult for them to make the children disappear ... with the connivance, possibly, of government officers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's not difficult for them to make the children disappear ... with the connivance, possibly, of government officers.

sentences.en: He tried to bribe the police into connivance.
sentences.cn: 他企图收买警察放他一马。

sentences.en: The criminals could not have escaped without your connivance.
sentences.cn: 囚犯没有你的默契配合，是逃不掉的。
